name: Reusable Cold/Hot Pack
descr:
Soft transparent gel keeps cold in freezer or refrigerator. Economical - can be used over and over. Micro-wavable and boiling for heat therapy.

Only sold in boxes with 25 packs.

Standard language in English and Danish. Also available in individual language (Danish, English, French, Dutch and German) and private logo by request - contact Chiroform for more information!
